casebody.data:
STATE of Iowa, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
William E. CRAWFORD, Defendant-Appellant. No. 17-1640 Court of Appeals of Iowa. Filed December 5, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

William Crawford appeals the judgment and sentence imposed following his second-degree-murder conviction. CONVICTION AFFIRMED, SENTENCE VACATED IN PART, AND REMANDED.

CONVICTION AFFIRMED. SENTENCE VACATED IN PART. REMANDED.
